Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023.bases

Interface RegistrationCI

All Superinterfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
All Known Implementing Classes:
RegistrationConnector, RegistrationInboundPort, RegistrationOutboundPort
public interface RegistrationCI extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
The component interface RegistrationCI defines the registration service of home energy managers that allows digital electric equipments to register for their remote control.

Description

This component interface is part of a master course project aiming at developing a mockup of a future home energy manager connected to a smart grid.

The designed home energy manager requires a public component interface to control digital electric equipments, but in practice, home energy manager providers and equipment providers may not have the same interfaces. The idea here is to also define a public XML schema that allows an equipment provider to provide the home energy manager with a description of how to make the link between the home energy manager required interface and its own offered interface. The home energy manager can then generate a specific connector that will accept calls following the required interface but that will call the equipment respecting its offered interface.

This component interface is offered by the home energy manager and is meant to be required by equipments that want to be connected to it.

Black-box Invariant

 invariant      true        // no more invariant

Created on : 2023-09-15

Author:
Jacques Malenfant

      return true if the equipment has been registered on this home energy manager.

       pre    true        // no precondition.
 post   true        // no postcondition.
      Parameters:
      uid - unique identifier of the equipment (e.g., serial number).
      Returns:
      true if the equipment has been registered on this home energy manager.

      Exception - to do.

    • register

      boolean register(String uid, String controlPortURI, String path2xmlControlAdapter) throws Exception
      register a specific equipment on the home energy manager and connect it using the description of its offered interface.

      Contract

       pre    uid != null && !uid.isEmpty()
 pre    controlPortURI != null && !controlPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre    path2xmlControlAdapter != null && !path2xmlControlAdapter.isEmpty()
 pre    !registered(uid)
 post   !return || registered(uid)
      Parameters:
      uid - unique identifier of the equipment (e.g., serial number).
      controlPortURI - URI of the control inbound port of the equipment.
      path2xmlControlAdapter - path to the XML document file (as a string), which describes how to link the required interface to the offered interface of this equipment, null if the equipment offers exactly the required interface).
      Returns:
      true if the registration succeeded, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      Exception - to do.

    • unregister

      unregister a specific equipment from the home energy manager and disconnect it.

       pre    uid != null && !uid.isEmpty()
 pre    registered(uid)
 post   !registered(uid)
      Parameters:
      uid - unique identifier of the equipment (e.g., serial number).

      Exception - to do.
